Translations.Text: lilladhina ahsanu l-hus'na waziyadatun wala yarhaqu wujuhahum qatarun wala dhillatun ulaika ashabu l-janati hum fiha khaliduna

wa-alladhina kasabu l-sayiati jazau sayyi-atin bimith'liha watarhaquhum dhillatun ma lahum mina l-lahi min ʿasimin ka-annama ugh'shiyat wujuhuhum qitaʿan mina al-layli muz'liman ulaika ashabu l-nari hum fiha khaliduna
wayawma nahshuruhum jamiʿan thumma naqulu lilladhina ashraku makanakum antum washurakaukum fazayyalna baynahum waqala shurakauhum ma kuntum iyyana taʿbuduna
fakafa bil-lahi shahidan baynana wabaynakum in kunna ʿan ʿibadatikum laghafilina
hunalika tablu kullu nafsin ma aslafat waruddu ila l-lahi mawlahumu l-haqi wadalla ʿanhum ma kanu yaftaruna

qul man yarzuqukum mina l-samai wal-ardi amman yamliku l-samʿa wal-absara waman yukh'riju l-haya mina l-mayiti wayukh'riju l-mayita mina l-hayi waman yudabbiru l-amra fasayaquluna l-lahu faqul afala tattaquna
fadhalikumu l-lahu rabbukumu l-haqu famadha baʿda l-haqi illa l-dalalu fa-anna tus'rafuna
kadhalika haqqat kalimatu rabbika ʿala alladhina fasaqu annahum la yu'minuna
qul hal min shurakaikum man yabda-u l-khalqa thumma yuʿiduhu quli l-lahu yabda-u l-khalqa thumma yuʿiduhu fa-anna tu'fakuna
qul hal min shurakaikum man yahdi ila l-haqi quli l-lahu yahdi lil'haqqi afaman yahdi ila l-haqi ahaqqu an yuttabaʿa amman la yahiddi illa an yuh'da fama lakum kayfa tahkumuna
wama yattabiʿu aktharuhum illa zannan inna l-zana la yugh'ni mina l-haqi shayan inna l-laha ʿalimun bima yafʿaluna
wama kana hadha l-qur'anu an yuf'tara min duni l-lahi walakin tasdiqa alladhi bayna yadayhi watafsila l-kitabi la rayba fihi min rabbi l-ʿalamina
am yaquluna if'tarahu qul fatu bisuratin mith'lihi wa-id'ʿu mani is'tataʿtum min duni l-lahi in kuntum sadiqina
bal kadhabu bima lam yuhitu biʿil'mihi walamma yatihim tawiluhu kadhalika kadhaba alladhina min qablihim fa-unzur kayfa kana ʿaqibatu l-zalimina
wamin'hum man yu'minu bihi wamin'hum man la yu'minu bihi warabbuka aʿlamu bil-muf'sidina
wa-in kadhabuka faqul li ʿamali walakum ʿamalukum antum bariuna mimma aʿmalu wa-ana barion mimma taʿmaluna
wamin'hum man yastamiʿuna ilayka afa-anta tus'miʿu l-suma walaw kanu la yaʿqiluna
wamin'hum man yanzuru ilayka afa-anta tahdi l-ʿum'ya walaw kanu la yub'siruna
inna l-laha la yazlimu l-nasa shayan walakinna l-nasa anfusahum yazlimuna
wayawma yahshuruhum ka-an lam yalbathu illa saʿatan mina l-nahari yataʿarafuna baynahum qad khasira alladhina kadhabu biliqai l-lahi wama kanu muh'tadina
wa-imma nuriyannaka baʿda alladhi naʿiduhum aw natawaffayannaka fa-ilayna marjiʿuhum thumma l-lahu shahidun ʿala ma yafʿaluna
walikulli ummatin rasulun fa-idha jaa rasuluhum qudiya baynahum bil-qis'ti wahum la yuz'lamuna
wayaquluna mata hadha l-waʿdu in kuntum sadiqina
qul la amliku linafsi darran wala nafʿan illa ma shaa l-lahu likulli ummatin ajalun idha jaa ajaluhum fala yastakhiruna saʿatan wala yastaqdimuna
qul ara-aytum in atakum ʿadhabuhu bayatan aw naharan madha yastaʿjilu min'hu l-muj'rimuna
athumma idha ma waqaʿa amantum bihi al'ana waqad kuntum bihi tastaʿjiluna
thumma qila lilladhina zalamu dhuqu ʿadhaba l-khul'di hal tuj'zawna illa bima kuntum taksibuna
